rules_text:
{3}{U}, Exile this artifact from the battlefield or your graveyard: Discover 5. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](To discover 5, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 5 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
Crew 1
